sentences.en: Air ducts and electrical cables were threaded through the complex structure.
sentences.cn: 通风管和电缆在这幢结构复杂的建筑物中穿过。

sentences.en: an electrical fault in the engine
As you've probably guessed, the problem was electrical.
sentences.cn: 你们可能已经猜测出来了，这个问题与电有关。

sentences.en: electrical labour-saving devices around the home
sentences.cn: 节省劳力的各种家用电器

sentences.en: electrical pulses zinging down a wire
sentences.cn: 迅速通过电线的电脉冲

sentences.en: Franklin's experiments showed that the lightning is an electrical discharge.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林的实验表明闪电是一种放电.
千万不要使电源插座过载。

sentences.en: Side cutters are useful for cutting electrical flex to length.
sentences.cn: 切边钳适用于剪切电线.

sentences.en: The aircraft made an unscheduled landing after developing an electrical fault.
sentences.cn: 飞机由于发生电力故障而作了临时降落。

sentences.en: The cooker, heaters and other electrical installations are all in perfect working order.
sentences.cn: 厨房 、 加热器以及其他电器设备都处于完好的工作状态.

sentences.en: The fire was caused by an electrical fault.
sentences.cn: 大火是电力故障引起的。

sentences.en: The fire was started by an electrical short-circuit.
sentences.cn: 火灾是由电线短路引发的。

sentences.en: The photochemical reactions transform the light into electrical impulses.
sentences.cn: 光化学反应使光变为电脉冲。

sentences.en: Their inventions have contributed to the development of electrical engineering.
sentences.cn: 他们的发明有助于电气工程学的发展.

sentences.en: There are consistent reports of electrical torture being practised on inmates.
sentences.cn: 一直有报道称犯人被施以电刑。

sentences.en: This degree programme is fully accredited by the Institution of Electrical Engineers.
sentences.cn: 这门学位课程经电气工程师学院鉴定完全合格。
